article_node.title: Hammond Power Solutions Provides Update on U.S. Tariff Changes
article_node.summary: Hammond Power Solutions notes that expanded U.S. steel and aluminum tariffs now apply to some of its components, but it expects a uniform industry impact and no material effect on its business. The company will monitor developments and collaborate with customers and suppliers to offset costs. It remains focused on growth in the United States and select global markets.
